FuncDef: This command designates the specified IOM as a WLAN-GW IOM. Each WLAN-GW IOM must be provisioned with two ISA-BB modules on a hardware chassis and with an ISA-BB module in the first MDA slot in the VSR.

ParaDef.Info: Indicates the IOM slot to be used in the WLAN-GW group. Values-1 to 10.

This parameter is supported on the VSR only. It determines if an IOM slot is used for load-balancing or UE anchoring and processing, or both. When the wlan-gw-group has only a single IOM, it is required to put this IOM in both modes at the same time.
